alert.note: Alert for Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:19PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan and north central Scott Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 719 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mansfield, or 11 miles northwest of Waldron, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Mansfield... Echo... Barber... Lucas... Carolan... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... Elm Park... Liberty... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
